channel.title: Projects on Stefanos Vardalos
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Stefanos Vardalos

item.title: CookList
item.description: This app is build on Angular, NodeJS and MongoDB. A theme from HTML5UP is used All artists and track data are fetched from the Spotify API. Playlist’s cover images are fetched from Unsplash API. It is hosted on Google Cloud, deployed using Docker and Kubernetes. Click here to learn more or here to try it out.

item.title: Faction Randomizer for SmashUp
item.description: This is an Android application build on Ionic Framework. It is an application that helps players of the SmashUp board game to set it up easier / faster. You can download it from Google PlayStore by clicking here.

item.title: PickAMovie
item.description: This is an Android application build on Java. It is an application that helps user to find a movie to watch, based on the responses they give on some questions. It uses the TMDb API to query and fetch info about Movies. You can download it from Google PlayStore by clicking here. You can check its Privacy Policy here

item.title: StefVardalos.github.io
item.description: This is static webpage / blog build using the Hugo Framework. A theme originally developed from HTML5UP is used, ported to Hugo by *jpescador. It is hosted on GitHub Pages.
